TcmtEventBits _bits

Detailed Description

class that can identify type of event in TCMT

The signal in the TCMT is analysed and compared to different thresholds. Following observables are used:

  • energy sum compared to min and max threshold
  • number hits compared to min and max threshold
  • number muon like layers compared to min threshold (the hits and energy in the layer have to be in range of a MIP signal)
  • number muon like towers compared to min and max threshold (the the sum of neighboring cells over consecutive layers have to exceed a certain limit)
See also:
TcmtEventBits
Todo:

implement thresholds for TCMT back section

remove hardcoded thresholds

Author:
Benjamin.Lutz@desy.de

thresholds are set inside here, currently hardcoded

[in] forcedEncoding can be used to overwrite the encoding string from the collection (to work around reconstruction bug)
